Meeting Title: Council on Court Procedures Publication Meeting
Short Description: Council on Court Procedures Publication Meeting
Details:
This is the Council's publication meeting, where Council members will vote on whether to publish draft ORCP amendments for review and comment by the bench and bar.

Comments from the bench and bar will be considered, and any published draft amendments will be forwarded to the December agenda.  The Council will then vote on whether to promulgate them (send them to the Legislature).  Promulgated rules become effective as law on the January 1 following adjournment of a session unless the Legislature, by statute, rescinds or modifies them.

Meeting Title: Council on Court Procedures Promulgation Meeting
Short Description: Council on Court Procedures Promulgation Meeting
Details:
This is the Council's promulgation meeting, where Council members will vote on whether to promulgate (send to the Legislature) draft ORCP amendments which were published at the September meeting.  Comments from the bench and bar will be considered between the September meeting and December meeting.

Promulgated rules become effective as law on the January 1 following adjournment of a session unless the Legislature, by statute, rescinds or modifies them.
